name: Quickfilter Technologies
overview: Quickfilter Technologies, Inc., a fabless semiconductor company, develops mixed signal integrated circuits for analog signal conditioning and digital signal processing in Texas. It offers programmable signal converters, development kits, programming adapters, and finite impulse response engines. The company’s programmable mixed-signal integrated circuits convert noisy analog signals into clean and usable digital signals. It also provides a WideAudio technology that enables stereo widening with two channels of audio equalization, as well as offers the developer with a psycho-acoustic effect. The companyâ€™s products are used for sensors in consumer audio, automotive, industrial control, medical equipment, homeland security, and engine control applications. It offers its products through distributors in the United States, the United Kingdom, Central Europe, Turkey, Spain, Portugal, France, Israel, Japan, and Korea. Quickfilter Technologies, Inc. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Allen, Texas.
